name: Non-congressional EE adding non-diabled 26 years old dependent

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for enrollment_open renewal employer with health benefits
Qualifying life events are present
there is an employer AB Widgets
AB Widgets employer has a staff role
renewal employer AB Widgets has active and renewal enrollment_open benefit applications
this employer renewal application is under open enrollment

elements.name: Employee enters a SEP, adds non-diabled 26 years old dependent and purchases plan

steps.name: there exists Patrick Doe employee for employer AB Widgets
employee Patrick Doe has current hired on date
employee Patrick Doe already matched with employer AB Widgets and logged into employee portal
Patrick Doe has active coverage and passive renewal
employee clicks "Shop for Plans" on my account page
employee clicks continue on the group selection page
employee sees the list of plans
employee selects a plan on the plan shopping page
employee clicks on Confirm button on the coverage summary page
employee should see the receipt page
employee should see the "my account" page
employee clicks "Losing other health insurance" link in the qle carousel
employee selects a current qle date
employee sees the QLE confirmation message and clicks on continue
employee clicks Add Member
Employee should not see the Ageoff Exclusion checkbox
employee sees the new dependent form
employee enters the info of his dependent wife
employee clicks confirm member
employee should see 1 dependent
employee clicks continue on group selection page for dependents
employee clicks Shop for new plan button
employee sees the list of plans
employee selects a plan on the plan shopping page
employee clicks on Confirm button on the coverage summary page
employee clicks back to my account button
employee should see his active enrollment including his wife
Employee should click on Manage Family button
Employee should click on the Personal Tab link
Employee should not see the Ageoff Exclusion checkbox

name: Conversion employees can purchase coverage only through renewing plan year
description:
In order to make employees purchase coverage only using renewal plan year
  Employee should be blocked from buying coverage under off-exchange plan year

elements.name: New Hire should not get effective date before renewing plan year start date

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for enrollment_open renewal employer with health benefits
Qualifying life events are present
there is an employer ACME Widgets, Inc.
renewal employer ACME Widgets, Inc. has imported and renewal enrollment_open benefit applications
ACME Widgets, Inc. employer has a staff role
there is a census employee record for Patrick Doe for employer ACME Widgets, Inc.
staff role person logged in
ACME Widgets, Inc. employer visit the Employee Roster
Employer logs out
Employee has not signed up as an HBX user
Patrick Doe visits the employee portal
Patrick Doe creates an HBX account
Employee goes to register as an employee
Employee should see the employee search page
Employee enters the identifying info of Patrick Doe
Employee should see the matched employee record form
Employee accepts the matched employer
Employee completes the matched employee form for Patrick Doe
Employee sees the Household Info: Family Members page and clicks Continue
Employee sees the Choose Coverage for your Household page and clicks Continue
Employee selects the first plan available
Employee clicks Confirm
Employee sees the Enrollment Submitted page and clicks Continue
Employee Patrick Doe should see their plan start date on the page

census employee Patrick Doe new_hire_enrollment_period is greater than date of record

Employee should see the group selection page
Employee clicks continue on the group selection page
Patrick Doe should see "You're not yet eligible under your employer-sponsored benefits" error message

comments.value: # Is this needed?
# Scenario: Existing Employee should not get effective date before renewing plan year start date
# Given Conversion Employer for Soren White exists with active and renewing plan year
# And Employee has not signed up as an HBX user
# And Soren White visits the employee portal
# When Soren White creates an HBX account
# And I select the all security question and give the answer
# When I have submitted the security questions
# And I select the all security question and give the answer
# When I have submitted the security questions
# When Employee goes to register as an employee
# Then Employee should see the employee search page
# When Employee enters the identifying info of Soren White
# Then Employee should see the matched employee record form
# Then Employee Soren White should have the renewing plan year start date as earliest effective date
# Then Employee Soren White should not see earliest effective date on the page
# These is essentially the same scenarios as those on lines 35 and 52
# Scenario: Existing Employee can't buy coverage before open enrollment of renewing plan year
# Given Conversion Employer for Soren White exists with active and renewing plan year
# And Employer for Soren White published renewing plan year
# And Soren White already matched and logged into employee portal
# When Employee clicks "Shop for Plans" on my account page
# When Employee clicks continue on the group selection page
# Then Soren White should see "open enrollment not yet started" error message
# This is essentially the same scenario as the one on line 70
# Scenario: Existing Employee can't buy coverage under off-exchange plan year using QLE
# Given Conversion Employer for Soren White exists with active and renewing plan year
# And Employer for Soren White published renewing plan year
# And Soren White already matched and logged into employee portal
# When Employee click the "Married" in qle carousel
# And Employee select a past qle date
# Then Employee should see confirmation and clicks continue
# Then Employee should see family members page and clicks continue
# Then Employee should see the group selection page
# When Employee clicks continue on the group selection page
# Then Soren White should see "open enrollment not yet started" error message

name: Employee hired during renewal period

    Given Employer is a Renewing Employer
    Given New Employee is on the Census Employee Roster
    Given New Employee does not have a pre-existing person
    Then New Employee should be able to match Employer
    And Employee should be able to purchase Insurance

name: Newly designated employees can purchase coverage only through renewing plan year
description:
In order to make employees purchase coverage only using renewal plan year
  Employee should be blocked from buying coverage under previous year plan year

benefit market catalog exists for enrollment_open renewal employer with health benefits
there is an employer Acme Inc.

Acme Inc. employer has a staff role
there is a census employee record for Patrick Doe for employer Acme Inc.
census employee Patric Doe is a newly_designated_eligible employee
this employer Acme Inc. has first_of_month rule

steps.name: Employee has not signed up as an HBX user

employee Patrick Doe has earliest eligible date under current active plan year

employee Patrick Doe should see renewing benefit application start date as effective date

Patrick Doe should see the receipt page with renewing plan year start date as effective date

name: Employee passive renewal should be canceled when Employee selected coverage
description: After a passive renewal if employee makes a plan selection, passive renewal should be canceled
